@SenBlumenthal Hey Dick, How about you worry about the national debt rather than to give constituents free money, and why would you hen your president tells us the economy is the best it has ever been.

@SenBlumenthal Just the latest example of the unintended consequences of Democrat policies. Burden small businesses to the point of bankruptcy, and then use taxpayer dollars to fill the hole you have dug, portraying these actions as helping the middle class and working families. Bait n switch.
@SenBlumenthal Typical Dem - help cause a problem & then throw money at it to fix it.
